meta.description: Optimize the number of labradors and golden retrievers used to maximize newspaper delivery given treat constraints.

sets.name: DOGS
sets.description: Types of dogs used for newspaper delivery

params.name: newspapers_per_dog
params.description: Number of newspapers each type of dog can deliver

params.name: treats_per_dog
params.description: Number of treats required per dog

params.name: total_treats
params.description: Total number of small bone treats available

params.name: min_golden_retrievers
params.description: Minimum number of golden retrievers required

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of dog used

objective.name: max_newspapers
objective.description: Maximize the total number of newspapers delivered

constraints.name: treats_constraint
constraints.description: Total treats used by dogs must not exceed available treats

constraints.name: min_golden_retrievers_constraint
constraints.description: At least 50 golden retrievers must be used

constraints.name: max_labradors_constraint
constraints.description: At most 60% of the dogs can be labradors
